Description: Sherd from East Greek (North Ionian) Late Wild Goat pottery lid; underside reserved; cream slip; on edge of rim sets of opposed diagonal lines with glaze triangular fill; on top of rim red line; short verticals on flat moulding at edge of lid proper; on proper remains of animal frieze; legs of goats grazing to left and rosette filling ornament.
Curator's comments: From the same vessel as 1924,1201.906 and 1888,0601.177.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GG.1171)
